document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Discovery 
Date: Tue, 13 Jul 2021 21:14:32 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.07.13 MDC -  Maxwell PASSWORD.docx: 2021.07.13 MDC -
Maxwell MAIN.docx 
Cover letters for this drive are attached, let me know if they're okay to go out. The drive is being loaded now with the 
materials' inked below (thank you!) and will go out with FedEx either this evening or tomorrow morning, depending 
on when the drive finishes loading. 
From 
Sent: Tuesda Jul 13 2021 3:30 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Discovery 
Thanks very much to you both! 
From• 
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 2021 1:16 PM 
To: 
c: 
Subject: RE: Discovery 
The most recent productions that have gone to Maxwell at MDC — and that we have not already reproduced on a hard 
drive —  are: 
• 2021.05.21 (disc) —  the Seventeenth Production, saved here (includes subpoena returns, native carved images, and 
images) 
• 2021.06.10 (disc) —  reproduction of the Seventeenth Production, above ^, after original disc was sent back to us. 
The original disc worked on my end, so maybe it is a problem with the larger 8GB discs we had to use? 
Nevertheless, the materials to be loaded are the Seventeenth Production. Thanks, team!! 
From 
Se • • 
To: 
Cc 
Subject: Re: Discovery 
EFTA00010145

I can handle, currently unpacking some stuff from trial but will look for the drive and try and load it later this afternoon. 
Could one of you please just let me know what discovery needs to be loaded onto it (or since which date) since I've been 
out of the loop for a bit? 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 13, 2021, at 12:29 PM 
Hi team, 
wrote: 
Any chance one of you would be able to track down a drive that Maxwell's lawyers dropped off yesterday for 
please? Or if not, any chance you could point us to someone who would be able to help find the drive? 
We need to get it loaded with the most recent productions that went to Maxwell on CDs. 
"mhanks 
From 
Sent: Monda Jul12, 2021 10:57 PM 
To 
c: 
Subject: RE: Discovery 
We dropped off the drive this afternoon. It should be addressed to. Let me know if you have trouble finding it. 
Thanks, 
a u : 
From 
Sent: on 
To: 
Cc: 
Sub] : : iscovery 
Hope you are well, too, thanks. 
We should have a production of additional non-testifying witness materials prepared to produce to you by the end of 
next week. 
Did you drop off a hard drive today? If so, would you please let me know to whom it was addressed? and I are 
both traveling this week, and our paralegals are currently either out of the office or on trial, so we'll nee to get 
someone else to pick up and load the drive. 
Thanks, 
EFTA00010146

Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
Froni 
Sent: Frida Jul 9  2021 4:52 PM 
u  J :Discovery 
I hope you are all well. I wanted to circle back with you about two discovery issues. First, a little while back you said 
that you would be producing to us additional non-testifying 3500 material. When can we expect to receive that? 
Second, you produced the last few productions to Ms. Maxwell on disk. Those disks are now not working. We will drop 
off a hard drive to you on Monday. Please reload those productions onto the hard drive and send it to Ms. Maxwell in 
MDC. If the additional non-testifying 3500 material is ready to be produced, please include that on the drive. 
Regards, 
<image00 I  j pg> 
New 
York I  Paris I  Washington 
DC 
London 
<image002.jpg> 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this e-mail may be confidential and/or privileged. This e-mail is intended to be reviewed initially by only 
the individual named above. If the reader of this e-mail is not the intended recipient or a representative of the intended recipient. you are hereby notified that any 
review. dissemination or copying of this e-mail or the information contained herein is prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error. please immediately notify 
the sender by telephone and permanently delete this e-mail. Thank you. 
PRIVACY: A complete copy of our privacy policy can be viewed at: Mos] cohangrassercom/privacK-policx 
EFTA00010147
